metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items rejected
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items rejected") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items incomplete
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items incomplete") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items with confirmation date later than requested delivery date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order items with confirmation date later than requested delivery date") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders not related to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Manufacturing orders not related to planned order") * 100

metrics.name: Unreleased manufacturing orders with sales order confirmation date in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Unreleased manufacturing orders with sales order confirmation date in the past") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders released early
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders released early") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders released late
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders released late") * 100

metrics.name: Unreleased manufacturing orders overdue for release
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Unreleased manufacturing orders overdue for release") * 100

metrics.name: Released but undelivered manufacturing orders with sales order confirmation date in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Released but undelivered manufacturing orders with sales order confirmation date in the past") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders confirmed later than scheduled
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders confirmed later than scheduled") * 100

metrics.name: Undelivered manufacturing orders with scheduled finish date in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Undelivered manufacturing orders with scheduled finish date in the past") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders delivered after sales order confirmation date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders delivered after sales order confirmation date") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders delivered after scheduled finish date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders delivered after scheduled finish date") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order item stock exists
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Sales order item stock exists") * 100

metrics.name: Delivered manufacturing orders without 'Delivery completed' set
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Delivered manufacturing orders without 'Delivery completed' set") * 100

metrics.name: Confirmed manufacturing orders not finally confirmed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Confirmed manufacturing orders not finally confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders with overdelivery
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders with overdelivery") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders with underdelivery
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders with underdelivery") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders with zero in-house production time in material master
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Manufacturing orders with zero in-house production time in material master") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items created") * 100

metrics.name: Goods issue posted after planned goods issue date in sales order item
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Goods issue posted after planned goods issue date in sales order item") * 100

metrics.name: Delivery items created before goods receipt posted
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Delivery items created before goods receipt posted") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Manufacturing orders created") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Manufacturing orders created")

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders released (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Manufacturing orders released") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders released (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Manufacturing orders released")

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders initially confirmed (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Manufacturing orders initially confirmed") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders initially confirmed (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Manufacturing orders initially confirmed")

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders delivered (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Manufacturing orders delivered") * 100

metrics.name: Manufacturing orders delivered (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Manufacturing orders delivered")

metrics.name: Sales order items with goods issue posted (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Sales order items with goods issue posted") * 100

metrics.name: Sales order items with goods issue posted (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Sales order items with goods issue posted")

metrics.name: Customer invoice items created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Customer invoice items created") * 100

metrics.name: Customer invoice items created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Customer invoice items created")

metrics.name: Create sales order item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create sales order item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create production order with reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create production order with reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create production order without reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create production order without reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create process order with reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create process order with reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create process order without reference to planned order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create process order without reference to planned order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release production order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release production order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Release process order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Release process order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Initially confirm production order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Initially confirm production order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Initially confirm process order
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Initially confirm process order')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Deliver production order to sales order item stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Deliver production order to sales order item stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Deliver process order to sales order item stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Deliver process order to sales order item stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create outbound delivery item
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create outbound delivery item')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Post goods issue from sales order item stock
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Post goods issue from sales order item stock')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create customer invoice
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create customer invoice')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
